'''Radiant Spincrystal 11''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Mondstadt Starlit]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a rooftop of a building nearby [[Schulz's Blacksmith]].
